title: Noema Reference Semantic Profile v0.1
description: Optional common ontology for practical interoperability (non-normative)

object_type.description: High-level classification (e.g. Physical Good, Identity, Certificate)

semantic_state.description: Current operational semantic state (e.g. Verified, Operational, Expired)

functional_role.description: Primary role in context (e.g. Proof, Access, Ownership)

trust.description: Optional derived evaluation (always contextual and model-dependent; never part of Core)

level.description: Model-defined trust level (no universal scale assumed)
